title: Rajdhani Express halted after bomb scare
article_body: NEW DELHI: A Howrah-boundwas briefly halted at Ghaziabad in Uttar Pradesh after officials received a call warning of bomb on board the.The train was stopped shortly after leaving the New Delhi railway station and all the passengers were made to deboard, according to news agency ANI.Bomb squad was rushed to the spot, but did not find anything on board.
